snippet: Officers responding to a report of a bank robbery fatally shot a shirtless man during a standoff that was captured on cellphone video.
abstract: Police officers responding to report of bank robbery in Miami Beach, Fla, fatally shoot shirtless suspect after he flees officers into nearby barber shop and emerges with straight razor; suspect was reported to have bomb and threatened to shoot teller, but no weapons have been recovered from scene.
lead_paragraph: Officers responding to a report of a bank robbery fatally shot a shirtless man during a standoff that was captured on cellphone video.

headline.main: Fatal Miami Beach Police Shooting Is Caught on Grisly Video
headline.print_headline: Man Is Killed in Standoff With Police
